A wishlist app where 100% of our profits: A wishlist app where 100% of our profits go to charity.

A wishlist app where 100% of our profits go to charity. You create lists, share them with friends and family, and when people buy gifts through our links, stores pay us a commission. We donate all of it after covering basic costs (servers, that sort of thing). Free to use, no tracking, no ads.
A wishlist platform where every gift mak: A wishlist platform where every gift makes a double impact.

GiveTwice is a new project, aiming to la: GiveTwice is a new project, aiming to launch in early 2026. We don't have a track record yet — no revenue, no profits, and therefore no donations to report. We're building this from scratch, with the goal of making gift-giving more meaningful.
GiveTwice is open source. You can read e: GiveTwice is open source. You can read every line of code on GitHub.
GiveTwice will always be free. We'll nev: GiveTwice will always be free. We'll never sell your data. After covering basic costs, every cent of profit goes to charity. We'll keep improving it - on our own time - because we think gift-giving should be simple and meaningful.

Let's be honest: most wishlist apps look: Let's be honest: most wishlist apps look like they haven't been updated since 2010. Clunky interfaces, confusing navigation, ads everywhere.
Let's be upfront: \"100% of profits\" me: Let's be upfront: "100% of profits" means we first cover operating costs - servers, essential software, legal stuff. What's left goes entirely to charity.

meta.about: Learn how GiveTwice turns everyday gift-giving into charitable giving. We donate 100% of our profits to vetted charities.
meta.contact: Get in touch with the GiveTwice team. We'd love to hear your questions, feedback, or partnership ideas.
meta.faq: Find answers to common questions about GiveTwice - how to create wishlists, share them, claim gifts, and how our charity donations work.
meta.home: Create wishlists that give back. Share your gift ideas with friends and family while supporting charity - 100% of our profits are donated.
meta.login: Sign in to your GiveTwice account to manage your wishlists, track claimed gifts, and share your gift ideas with friends and family.
meta.privacy: Learn how GiveTwice protects your privacy and handles your personal data. We believe in transparency and minimal data collection.
meta.register: Join GiveTwice and start creating wishlists that give back. Free to use, with 100% of profits going to charity.
meta.terms: Terms of service for using GiveTwice. Read about your rights and responsibilities when using our wishlist platform.
meta.transparency: See how GiveTwice operates with full transparency. We publish regular reports on our revenue, operating costs, and charitable donations.
Most people only need one list. Create m: Most people only need one list. Create more only if you need them!
Most wishlist apps look like they haven': Most wishlist apps look like they haven't been updated since 2010. Clunky, confusing, covered in ads.
Most wishlist services are \"free\" - bu: Most wishlist services are "free" - but that usually means you're the product. Your data gets sold, your browsing habits tracked, your gift preferences monetized.

Transparency reports require actual numb: Transparency reports require actual numbers. Since we haven't launched yet, there's nothing to report — no affiliate revenue has been generated, no operating costs have been incurred beyond initial development, and no charitable donations have been made.

Want to verify that we're actually donat: Want to verify that we're actually donating profits? Check the code. Want to see how claims work? Check the code. Want to make sure we're not tracking you? Check the code.
We automatically fetch the product image: We automatically fetch the product image, description, and price from the URL in the background.
We believe it would be misleading to pub: We believe it would be misleading to publish empty reports or projections. Instead, we'll wait until we have real data to share.
We built this in public because we don't: We built this in public because we don't want you to just trust us. Verify it yourself.
We do things differently. We're complete: We do things differently. We're completely transparent about how we make money: affiliate commissions, with 100% of profits going to charity.
We don't purchase gifts for you. Head to: We don't purchase gifts for you. Head to the store and complete your order.
We donate 100% of our profits. The store: We donate 100% of our profits. The store pays us, not you.
We kept running into the same problems w: We kept running into the same problems with wishlists.
We looked everywhere, but couldn't find: We looked everywhere, but couldn't find what you're looking for. Maybe the link is broken, or the page has moved.
We run lean. No office, no bloated team,: We run lean. No office, no bloated team, no unnecessary tools. The less we spend, the more goes to charity.
We wanted to build something you'd actua: We wanted to build something you'd actually enjoy using. Clean design, no ads, no clutter. Just your gifts and a share button.
We'll automatically fetch the product ti: We'll automatically fetch the product title, image, and price.
We'll send you a confirmation link to ve: We'll send you a confirmation link to verify your claim.
We're aiming to launch in early 2026. On: We're aiming to launch in early 2026. Once we have real numbers, we'll publish them here.
We're here to help! Reach out and we'll: We're here to help! Reach out and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
We're publishing this page now — before: We're publishing this page now — before we launch — to hold ourselves accountable. When the time comes, you'll find our transparency reports right here. If we're not living up to our promises, we want you to call us out.
We're putting the finishing touches on G: We're putting the finishing touches on GiveTwice. Sign up will be available soon!
We're still figuring this out. We're lau: We're still figuring this out. We're launching in early 2026, and we'll announce our charity partners before then. We plan to rotate partners and publish exactly how much we donate to each one.
We've built GiveTwice around a simple id: We've built GiveTwice around a simple idea: 100% of our affiliate profits go to charity. But promises are easy to make — we believe in proving them.
Welcome to :app, a wishlist platform wit: Welcome to :app, a wishlist platform with a purpose.

When someone claims a gift, you just see: When someone claims a gift, you just see "someone is getting this" - no names, no hints. The surprise stays a surprise.
When the product is free, you're usually: When the product is free, you're usually the product. Your gift preferences sold to advertisers.
When two-factor authentication is enable: When two-factor authentication is enabled, you will be prompted for a secure, random token during authentication. You may retrieve this token from your phone's authenticator application.
When you buy gifts through our links, we: When you buy gifts through our links, we donate 100% of our affiliate profits to charity. No extra cost to you, just extra good in the world.
Whether you have a question about featur: Whether you have a question about features, need help with your wishlist, or just want to say hello - we're here for you.
